vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Gad living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.5.14;
son of: Jaroah (H3386);
father of: Abihail (H0032I)
§ Huri = "linen-weaver"
a Gadite, father of Abihail
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Jaróah; tribu de Gad
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
戶利 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "織麻者"
迦得人, 亞比孩的父親 (代上 5:14)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
户利 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "织麻者"
迦得人, 亚比孩的父亲 (代上 5:14)
